title: Authentication Success with Valid Credentials and JWT Token Expiration
description: Verify that user login succeeds with correct credentials and that a JWT token is issued with an 8-hour expiration.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid username and password.
Submit login form.
Verify login is successful and JWT token is stored with an expiration time of 8 hours.

title: Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid username or password is provided with proper error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid username or password.
Submit login form.
Verify login failure and appropriate error message displayed.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that users with different roles (seller, manager, admin) have access restrictions enforced correctly on various routes and features.

steps.description: Login as seller and attempt to access admin-only pages.
Verify access is denied and proper redirect or error is shown.
Login as manager and try to access user management features.
Verify access is denied or limited according to permissions.
Login as admin and verify full access to user and branch management.
Verify all admin features are accessible.

title: Product SKU and Barcode Uniqueness Validation on Creation
description: Ensure that products cannot be created with duplicate SKUs or barcodes individually or during bulk import.

steps.description: Attempt to create a new product with an SKU or barcode that already exists.
Verify the system rejects creation with an appropriate error message.
Upload a bulk import file containing duplicate SKUs or barcodes.
Verify duplicates are detected and import is blocked or flagged with error feedback.

title: Add Product to POS Cart with Stock Availability Check
description: Validate that products can only be added to the POS cart if sufficient stock is available for the selected size in the specific branch.

steps.description: Search for a product by name, SKU, or barcode.
Select quantity and size variant.
Add product to POS cart.
Verify product is successfully added if stock is sufficient.
Attempt to add more quantity than available stock.
Verify system prevents adding and shows clear feedback about insufficient stock.

title: Complete Sale Transaction Processing and Stock Adjustment
description: Ensure sales transaction processes correctly with payment method selection, discount application (if authorized), receipt printing, and proper stock decrement with inventory logs updated.

steps.description: Add products with valid quantity and sizes to POS cart.
Proceed to payment step and select payment method.
Apply discount with authorized user.
Confirm sale transaction.
Verify sale number is uniquely generated.
Verify stock levels are reduced accordingly.
Verify inventory movement logs are created.
Verify thermal receipt is printed or generated.

title: POS Cart Sale Failure on Stock Conflict Before Completion
description: Simulate stock reduction by another transaction to verify that sales cannot be completed if stock is insufficient at confirmation time, preventing overselling.

steps.description: Add product to POS cart with quantity available.
Before confirming sale, simulate stock reduction externally.
Attempt to complete sale transaction.
Verify sale is blocked and error is shown indicating stock conflict.

title: E-commerce Product Browsing and Filtering
description: Ensure customers can browse the e-commerce product catalog with filters (category, brand, size) and search functionality working correctly.

steps.description: Access e-commerce catalog page.
Apply filters such as category, brand, and size.
Perform text search by product name or SKU.
Verify product list updates correctly according to filters and search input.

title: E-commerce Checkout Validation and Order Confirmation
description: Verify that the e-commerce checkout form validates all required delivery details and checks stock availability before confirming the order.

steps.description: Add products with selected sizes and quantities to cart.
Proceed to checkout page and fill in incomplete customer or delivery details.
Attempt to confirm order.
Verify validation errors are shown for missing required data.
Fill all required fields correctly.
Simulate stock insufficient for one product before confirmation.
Attempt to confirm order.
Verify order confirmation is blocked with stock error.

title: Dashboard Real-Time Analytics and Low Stock Alerts
description: Validate that sales metrics, inventory alerts, and quick action modules on the dashboard update in real-time and reflect correct data filtered by user role and branch.

steps.description: Login as manager with access to dashboard.
Verify sales metrics and inventory alerts display current data.
Trigger a low stock condition by selling or adjusting stock.
Verify low stock alert appears dynamically on dashboard.
Check quick action buttons (e.g., stock adjustment, report navigation) work correctly.

title: Inventory Management: Multi-Branch Stock Updates and Alerts
description: Verify that stock can be managed accurately per branch with size variants, bulk imports are processed validating SKU/barcode, and low stock alerts are triggered when thresholds reached.

steps.description: Open inventory management and select a product.
Update stock quantities by size for multiple branches.
Verify stock levels update correctly per branch and size.
Upload bulk import file with product SKUs and barcodes.
Verify bulk import processes successfully if no duplicates; otherwise errors shown.
Reduce stock below alert threshold.
Verify low stock alert notification is generated.

title: Sales Reporting: Filter, Export CSV and PDF
description: Verify that administrators and managers can generate and export detailed sales reports filtered by date range, branch, and sales type with accurate data.

steps.description: Navigate to sales reports section.
Select date range filter.
Select one or multiple branches and sales channels.
Generate report.
Verify report data matches expected sales according to filters.
Export report as CSV.
Verify CSV file downloads correctly with proper format.
Export report as PDF.
Verify PDF file downloads correctly and data is represented properly.

title: User and Branch Management CRUD with Role Assignments
description: Ensure admin users can create, read, update, and delete users and branches while assigning roles and permissions correctly, verifying data consistency and UI feedback.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to user management.
Create a new user with specified role.
Verify new user appears in list with correct role.
Edit existing user details and roles.
Verify updates are saved and reflected.
Delete a user and confirm removal.
Verify user is removed from system.
Repeat CRUD tests for branch management.
Verify branches are correctly managed similarly.

title: System Configuration Settings Validation
description: Validate that system configuration for payment methods, tax rates, currency, and custom installments can be created, updated, and saved with proper validation and error feedback.

steps.description: Open system configuration settings page.
Add a new payment method with valid details.
Verify payment method appears in the list.
Update tax rates with valid and invalid values.
Verify validation errors for invalid input and success for valid input.
Configure currency and custom installments.
Verify configurations save successfully and reflect in relevant forms.

title: Performance Benchmark: API Response and Load Times
description: Ensure the system meets performance targets: API responses under 200ms, page load under 3 seconds on 3G, product search under 100ms, and sale processing under 500ms under simulated load conditions.

steps.description: Measure API response times for key endpoints under typical load.
Verify API responses are less than 200ms.
Load main pages (dashboard, POS, inventory) on 3G simulation.
Verify page loads complete within 3 seconds.
Perform product search operations.
Verify search results appear within 100ms.
Perform sale transaction through POS.
Verify sale processing completes within 500ms.
